settings.title: Joshua
settings.description: I am a husband and a father to 3 beautiful little girls. 2 things I love; I love God and I love people. The Kingdom in us transforms the Kingdom around us!

settings.title: Sharon
settings.description: I'm the Creative Manager at Kings Loot. I'm extroverted and love meeting new people. In my free time, I enjoy traveling, videography, theatre, and dancing!

settings.title: Jerry
settings.description: Hello. I'm Jerry and I'm with the Operations Division of Kings Loot. I'm a traveler by habit, a voracious reader and really like helping people find out who they are.

settings.title: Lenna
settings.description: My name is Lenna, I am the content creator at Kings Loot! I enjoy making others laugh and smile, while also being relatable to our customers! I enjoy spending time with family and enjoying the beautiful outdoors of Colorado!

settings.title: Angel
settings.description: Hello! I moved from Phoenix, Arizona, where I was born and raised, to join the Kings Loot family. I love being active, whether that’s playing sports or just being active in nature. You can count me in!

settings.title: Maya
settings.description: Hey, my name is Maya! I work in Kings Loot as a Customer Care Manager. When I’m not serving our customers, I am cooking, walking with my dogs and cat, or exploring the country with my husband.

settings.title: Ian
settings.description:
Athlete turned entrepreneur
Drafted by the Chicago Cubs in 2011
Now an eCommerce nerd
Enjoys long hikes with his wife Alicia and pup Oreo

settings.title: Joel
settings.description: Hey, my name is Joel! I work in KingShip as the Warehouse. Manager fulfilling all the orders for Kings Loot. When I'm not leading warehouse operations, you can find me exploring the country with my wife, enjoying the company of friends and family, or reading anything I can get my hands on.

settings.title: Chris
settings.description: Hi! I'm Chris from the Philippines. I am Graphic Designer specialized in photo manipulation. I'm also a gaming content creator, I love doing live stream while playing games!

settings.title: Marko
settings.description: Hello, my name is Marko, and I'm a full-stack designer with a focus on product design and 3d editing. For fun I like going to the beach.

settings.title: ROZIE
settings.description: Hey, my name is Rozie! I love the ocean, and nature, and I surf in my free time. I'm always an island girl at heart. I help the Customer Service team to resolve tickets and make sure our customers are happy with their Kings Loot wallets.

settings.title: FANNY
settings.description: My name is Fanny, born and raised in NY and residing in Providence, RI. I'm blessed with beautiful almost teenage twins, Julianna and Jeremiah. I'm Kings Loot Virtual Assistant. I make sure that things are running smoothly and am the CEO's right-hand person.

settings.title: Meet Our Team!
settings.content: Our Kings Loot family helps make our company even better. Take some time to meet everyone!
